## BufferDataType enum

Enum specifying the type of data provided to the buffer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum BufferDataType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  byte | <code>5120</code> | 8 bit integers. Mostly used with <code>Int8Array</code>. Ranging <code>-128</code> to <code>127</code>. |
|  float | <code>5126</code> | 32 bit floats. Mostly used with <code>Float32Array</code>. Ranging <code>1.175e-38</code> to <code>3.4e+38</code> |
|  halfFloat | <code>5131</code> | 16 bit floats. Mostly used with <code>Int16Array</code>. Ranging <code>6.1e-5</code> to <code>6.55e+4</code> |
|  int | <code>5124</code> | 32 bit integers. Mostly used with <code>Int32Array</code>. Ranging <code>-2147483648</code> to <code>2147483647</code>. |
|  short | <code>5122</code> | 16 bit integers. Mostly used with <code>Int16Array</code>. Ranging <code>-32768</code> to <code>32767</code>. |
|  unsignedByte | <code>5121</code> | 8 bit unsigned integers. Mostly used with <code>Uint8Array</code> or <code>Uint8ClampedArray</code>. Ranging <code>0</code> to <code>255</code>. |
|  unsignedInt | <code>5125</code> | 32 bit unsigned integers. Mostly used with <code>Uint32Array</code>. Ranging <code>0</code> to <code>4294967295</code>. |
|  unsignedShort | <code>5123</code> | 16 bit unsigned integers. Mostly used with <code>Uint16Array</code>. Ranging <code>0</code> to <code>65535</code> |
